artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Kagaya Kichibei; Carver: Sashichi
creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
dimension: 14 5/8 × 30 in. (37.15 × 76.2 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban triptych)
inscription: left: 鴦どりの精; center: 鴛どりの精; right: 冠者義隆
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Oshidori no shosa 鴛鴦の所作, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 5th lunar month 1855.
title: Actors Bandō Takesaburō I as Men'oshidori no Sei (L), Nakamura Fukusuke I as Oshidori no Sei (C), and Bandō Kamezō I as Shimizu no Kanja Yoshitaka (R)
